ideas.title: Codebreaker's Quest

protagonist.name: Mia Chen
protagonist.background: Chinese-American girl from a working-class family in rural Kansas, living with her single mom and younger brother
protagonist.struggle: Dyslexia causing difficulties with decoding multisyllabic words

ideas.contemporary_hook: AI-powered personal coding assistants becoming a hit among kids for building apps
ideas.literacy_skill: Decoding multisyllabic words through syllable division
ideas.creative_integration: Mia's passion for coding apps mirrors breaking down complex code into syllables, helping her divide words like 'programming' into manageable parts

setting.secondary: Virtual AI coding lab that feels like a futuristic spaceship

ideas.character_arc: Mia struggles with reading code instructions, gets frustrated during a school hackathon, has a breakthrough by applying syllable rules to both words and code, masters the skill to win a challenge, and teaches her brother how to decode words using coding analogies
ideas.unique_element: The AI assistant turns out to be programmed by Mia's absent father, leading to an emotional family reunion
ideas.pitch: In the heart of Kansas farmland, 10-year-old Mia Chen dreams of becoming a coder but her dyslexia makes decoding long words as tricky as buggy software. When a trendy AI coding buddy sweeps through her school in 2025, Mia discovers that breaking down app commands is just like slicing multisyllabic words into syllables. As she navigates a virtual spaceship lab and a local hackathon, Mia overcomes frustration, masters her reading hurdle, and even reunites her family through a surprising digital twist, proving that every problem has a clever fix.

By treating words like beats in a remix, Jamal learns to read with prosody and rhythm, turning his frustration into a triumphant performance. Amid community centers and glowing digital arenas, he uncovers a mysterious twist in the app's code, masters his skill, and inspires his friends to groove through their own reading challenges in this high-energy tale of beats and breakthroughs.

ideas.contemporary_hook: Youth podcasting booms with AI voice effects for storytelling and mental health sharing
ideas.literacy_skill: Prosody in oral reading for fluency and comprehension
ideas.creative_integration: Sami's podcasting passion involves narrating tales with expressive prosody, using AI feedback to adjust tone and pacing, naturally building reading expression through episode recordings

setting.primary: Houston family home with a makeshift studio
setting.secondary: Phantom audio realm where stories echo as living echoes

ideas.character_arc: Sami struggles with flat readings that bore listeners, gets frustrated by low episode plays, breaks through by experimenting with voice effects, masters prosody to captivate audiences, and teaches family members to share their own tales
ideas.unique_element: Sami's podcast attracts a mysterious listener who turns out to be a long-lost relative, responding only to his improved expressive readings
ideas.pitch: In a bustling Houston home, nine-year-old Sami Al-Mansour spins phantom tales on his podcast, but lifeless prosody haunts his stories—until AI echoes teach him expressive flair, transforming flat frustration into mesmerizing mastery and reuniting family through voices that resonate across generations.
